articles.description: Former legendary pacer Shoaib Akhtar asked Mohammad Amir to 'grow up' and said the only way for a player to prove himself is to perform.
articles.content: Mohammad Amir has been at the helm of controversy ever since announcing his retirement from international cricket in December 2020. He first announced his retirement from Test cricket earlier in 2020… [+2532 chars]
